full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @031B BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KA MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA RIN CHEN @032A *, ,BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BDAG SOGS RKANG DRUG TSOGS, ,'JAM DBYANGS NYIN BYED THUGS RJE'I 'OD STONG GIS, ,BLO YI PADMO'I GE SAR RGYAS MDZAD DE, RGYA CHE GSAL ZHING MYUR DANG ZAB PA DANG, THOS BSAM BSGOM DANG 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM SOGS KYI, SHES RAB KYI SBRANG RTZI'I DGA' STON GYIS ROL PAS, ,PHYI NANG GRUB MTHA'I MTHAR SON SGRIB GNYIS KYI, ,MUN 'JOMS KUN MKHYEN YE SHES THOB GYUR CIG , ,BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
translator_(орчуулагч): SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KU MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG PO
editor_(хянан_тохиолдуулагч): SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KU MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG PO
